item.title: Near-Mage
item.description: Game Description The magic universe in Near-Mage shows the adventures of the young girl Illy Vraj, who was invited to live in Transylvania for the summer. The girl will meet with her cousin Dominica, who wants to tell her about the secret witch’s kind. The heroine will receive the opportunity to enter the Transylvanian Institute of Magic, where he will master the art of witchcraft. The girl will go to the preparatory summer school to become a full -fledged caster.

item.title: Ribby: The Game
